content.rendered:
Welcome to Roomi’s Help Center

About Roomi
  • Where is Roomi available?
  • How do I contact Roomi?
  • Roomi Guidelines
  • Is Roomi free to use?
Listings
  • How do I boost my listing?
  • Can I list multiple rooms?
  • Does my listing ever expire?
  • How to favorite listings
  • How can I trust that listings are real?
  • How do I create a listing?
  • How do I deactivate a listing?
  • How do I edit my listing?
  • How do I permanently delete my room listing?
  • How do I search for a room on Roomi?
  • Why do my listings keep getting deactivated?
  • Why is the status of my listing marked ‘Insufficient’ or ‘Rejected’?
  • How to search for rooms that allow couples
  • How do I share my listing via SMS, email, Facebook, or other methods?
  • How do I browse people (roommates) on Roomi?
User profile
  • Profile Photo Requirements
  • How do I verify my identity and complete a background check?
  • How do I delete my account on Roomi?
  • What is GlobaliD?
  • More information about GlobaliD

jetpack-related-posts.title: About
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: You've got big plans. Maybe you're moving for work, or traveling just because—but wherever you're headed, an old-school, yearlong lease won't cut it anymore. That's why we're here. We wake up every morning to help you find flexible, affordable housing and connect with roommates who make the big city feel…

jetpack-related-posts.title: 5 Simple Habits To Help You Fall Asleep Faster
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Blessed are those who fall asleep the moment their heads hit the pillow. If you're reading this, there's a high probability you're on your bed trying to get to sleep. So LEAVE THE PHONE (after reading this article) and try and go to sleep for god's sake! Easier written than…
